message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its importance and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $12,000. This price reflects its true worth while allowing us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
